name: esbuild-plugin-noflo
description: Bundle NoFlo graphs, components with esbuild bundler to a single javascript file without any other dependencies except for builtin node libs.
author: Andreas Heissenberger <andreas@heissenberger.at>

scripts.build: microbundle build  -i src/index.ts -f es,cjs --sourcemap; microbundle build  -i src/lib/loader.js -o dist/loader.js -f cjs
scripts.dev: microbundle build  -i src/lib/loader.js --no-compress -o dist/loader.js -f cjs;microbundle watch src/index.ts -f es,cjs --no-compress --sourcemap
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -fr ./dist && microbundle build -i src/index.ts  -f es,cjs --compress --no-sourcemap && microbundle build  -i src/lib/loader.js --compress --no-sourcemap -o dist/loader.js -f cjs
